scripts.lint: npm run compile && node . --linter --input-dir ./interface_sdk-js/api/@internal/component/ets/ --input-file common.d.ts --output-dir linter --linter-whitelist whitelist.json
scripts.lint:all: npm run compile && node . --linter --input-dir ./interface_sdk-js/api/@internal/component/ets/ --output-dir linter --linter-whitelist whitelist.json
scripts.check:peers: npm run run2peer:all && tsc -p ./tsconfig-generated.json && cp peer_lib/package.json.peers.in build/peers/package.json
scripts.check:subset: npm run compile && node . --api-version 99 --dts2peer --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets/ --output-dir ./generated/subset && tsc -p ./tsconfig-subset.json && cp peer_lib/package.json.subset.in build/subset/package.json
scripts.check:subset:run: npm run check:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-subset && node ./build/subset
scripts.check:peers:run: npm run check:peers && npm run compile:native-node-host-full && node ./build/peers
scripts.check:subset:fuzz: npm run compile && node . --dts2test --input-dir ./tests/subset/ets  --output-dir ./generated/fuzz && npm run check:subset && npm run compile:native-node-host-subset && node ./build/subset/generated/fuzz
scripts.check:peers:native: npm run run2peer:all && npm run compile:native-node-host-full
scripts.configure:native-node-host-subset: npm run download:napi && cd ./native && meson setup -Dsubset=true build-node-host-subset
scripts.compile:native-node-host-subset: npm run configure:native-node-host-subset && cd native && meson compile -C build-node-host-subset && meson install -C build-node-host-subset
scripts.configure:native-node-host-full: npm run download:napi && cd ./native && meson setup -Dsubset=false build-node-host-full
scripts.compile:native-node-host-full: npm run configure:native-node-host-full && cd native && meson compile -C build-node-host-full && meson install -C build-node-host-full
scripts.install:peer:deps: npm run compile:stub:deps && npm run copy:peer:deps
scripts.sanity: npm run check:peers:run && npm run run:all && npm run lint:all
